title: "Not yet implemented"
body:
Whenever I want to play a custom game and add bots on the other team it doesn't let me, it was letting me last update but with the new update whenever I try to add bots it just says "Not yet implemented" and wont let me. 

Thank you for the help!!

replies.body:
Bot are not currently available for testing on the updated client.  You'll want to return to the legacy anytime you want to complete a function that gives a not yet implemented error:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
Go buy the champ from the store. You should be fine

The beta client does not yet have support for adding bots in custom games. You can still use the legacy client to play a custom game with bots in it. To start the legacy client, click the **Launch Legacy Client** link in the bottom right hand corner *before* logging in.
I'm having the same problem... Maybe they're adding more bots? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Another thing is that it wont let me buy champions because I'm "Not yet implemented"
